com.yunfang.framework.utils

类 ScrollDetectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yunfang.framework.utils.ScrollDetectors

  • public class ScrollDetectors
extends Object
    Provide base implements of ViewPager, HorizontalScrollView, WebView scroll detect, You can use ScrollDetectorFactory to add your own implements of ScrollDetectors.ScrollDetector slideMenu侧滑，需要用到的
    作者:
    Tank
